problem: 如图,点A、B是⊙O上两点,AB=8,点P是⊙O上的动点,连接AP、PB,过点O分别作OE⊥AP于E,OF⊥PB于F,则EF为()
comment: 本题考查的是垂径定理,熟知垂直于弦的直径平分弦是解答此题的关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, points A and B are two points on ⊙O, AB = N_0, point P is the moving point on ⊙O. Connect AP and PB, and crossing point O to draw OE ⊥ AP at E and OF ⊥ PB at F respectively, Then EF is ()
